message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $13,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $13,500? This would be a good deal for both of us.
